I hereby claim:

  * I am an admin of http://tricx.net
  * I am tricx (https://keybase.io/tricx) on keybase.
  * I have a public key with fingerprint 22DC 3645 EE29 A42F FEC4  6F8A 2E90 FAFE 0802 0563

To claim this, I am signing this object:
